channel.title: Anti Dm on Mr Beaner - Put Coffee in your rice!
channel.description: Recent content in Anti Dm on Mr Beaner - Put Coffee in your rice!

item.title: xinitrc
item.description: This is part of my anti-DM suite. The stuff I want to happen just before i3 loads up, goes here. Having urxvt in daemon mode is really nice. And I use xsetroot and a solid “greyed” color from Xresources instead of a wallpaper. I have written a little piece about the strange keyboard layout Seba. There is also a short text on why i use sxhkd.
